review: This is my third Roku product I have purchased.  The original or legacy model, call it what you want, has been retired and replaced with a Roku 3 some time back.  Other than some minor issues with the remote I love this device.The Streaming Stick was recently purchased to use with a Samsung Smart TV in the bedroom.  Now you might be thinking if you have a Smart TV, what need do you have for a different Streaming device? If you have any experience with Samsung's Smart Hub, which you have to use to stream content, you know the answer already.No more endless waiting for updates every time you turn the stupid thing on. And when you only watch about 45 minutes before lights out, the reasons are clear.So far, this Roku device has performed up to the standards I demand from my Roku 3.  The only thing I'm not crazy about is the feel of the remote control. Probably just too used to the 3 remote I guess.This device was chosen as the TV is mounted high up on the wall and would have required me to take it down to install a 3 mount so the Stick was a no brainer to install.

review: I love Roku, but I'm not wild about the stick. Compared to the Roku 3 we have in the living room it is slow. Once the streaming starts it is all the same but navigating the menu or entering info on the text screen is slow and can be annoying at times. It also takes longer to start streaming. It's not a huge difference, but enough to make me appreciate using the Roku 3 as the main streaming device.
